MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 02-DEC-2020 11:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the WA16 postcode area of Mere, Knutsford affecting properties in Warrington Road, Clamhunger Lane, Mereside Road and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Our engineers on site are working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:16am 2 December 2020
